name: 米歇尔·西尔
introduction: Michelle Cyr is an active film and theatre actor based in Vancouver, Canada, located on the unceded and ancestral territory of the Musqueam, Squamish, and Tsleil-Waututh Nations. Michelle is a conservatory-trained actor whose work has been varied and character driven. Michelle's contribution to film, television, shorts and student films has made clear that they are a genuine character actor, from Shakespeare to immersive theatre with the renowned company Ontroerend Goed, and on to further experimental and socially driven independent works. Michelle is also a producer and film maker.
